effect.name: Gate Weave
effect.description: Randomly moves image around to simulate film gate weave
effect.author: esmane

parameter.name: Smoothness
parameter.comment: Factor used to blend between positions. A lower number means a faster effect

parameter.name: Maximum Horizontal Movement
parameter.comment: The maximum distance the picture could move left or right

parameter.name: Maximum Vertical Movement
parameter.comment: The maximum distance the picture could move up or down
